item.description:
Come play Team Trivia at the Living Room.
Trivia starts at 8 but we will get there earlier to get a sofa and get half priced apps that run from 4-7. I will leave work and go directly there so I should be there at 6.

$1 pp

List of Appetizers- everything is half off these prices!

MINI BURGERS $10 Four Three-Bite Certified Angus Beef Burgers® with Grilled Onions, Pickles and Ketchup

SPINACH AND ARTICHOKE DIP $10
Baked House-Made Spinach and Artichoke Dip, served with Warm Pita Bread and Tortilla Chips

SOUTHWESTERN ROLLS $9
Roasted Corn, Black Beans, Roasted Red Peppers and Pepper Jack Cheese in an Egg Roll Wrapper, flash-fried and served with Ranch Dipping Sauce

CHEESE & FRUIT PLATE FOR TWO $16
Soft French Brie and Boursin Cheese, served with Sliced Apples, Pears, Grapes and Imported Crackers

BUFFALO FRIED SHRIMP $14
Tempura-Battered Fried Shrimp, tossed in Frank’s Hot Sauce, served with shaved Celery and Mattie’s Blue Cheese Dipping Sauce

CHICKEN TAQUITOS $10
Grilled Chicken, Mozzarella Cheese and Latin Spices with Avocado Cream and Ancho Chili Sauce

AVOCADO TEMPURA $9
Ripe Hass Avocado, Tempura- Battered and Fried, served with Ponzu Sauce and Fresh Lime Aioli

MINI PULLED PORK SANDWICHES $9
Seasoned, Slow Roast Pork served with Caramelized Onion, and Spicy BBQ Sauce on Miniature Rolls

FRIED CHICKEN DUMPLINGS $9
Crispy Fried Wontons filled with Chopped Chicken and Scallions, served with Hoisin Dipping Sauce

CHICKEN SATAY $11
Grilled Chicken Skewers served with a Spicy Thai Peanut Dipping Sauce

CALAMARI $12
A Heaping Plate of lightly fried Calamari tossed with Hot Cherry Peppers, Balsamic Pickled Shallots and Red Tomato Sauce

WARM HUMMUS $9
House Hummus spiced with Roasted Red Peppers, Cumin, Sesame Oil and Garlic, served with Feta Cheese, Basil-Shallot Dressing and Warm Pita Bread

PORK & CHICKEN NACHOS $12
House Corn Tortillas topped with Grilled Chicken Breast, Roasted Pork, Hot Cherry Peppers, Black Beans, Diced Tomatoes , Melted Cheddar, Chopped Avocado and Sour Cream

SHRIMP AND AVOCADO EGGROLLS $12
Plump Shrimp and Avocado wrapped in an Egg Roll Skin, quickly fried, served with Vietnamese Sweet Chili Sauce
item.name: The Living Room- Team Trivia Tuesday
